Title: WebMatrixColorizer
Description: WebMatrix 2.0 supports code color theming but uses a different .XML file than Visual Studio's. This simple app converts a .vssettings file into a color scheme importable by WebMatrix. Export from VS or download from StudioStyl.es, then convert and import. Want a dark theme? Easy!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WebMatrix 2.0 supports code color theming but uses a different .XML file than Visual Studio's. This simple app converts a .vssettings file into a color scheme importable by WebMatrix. Export from VS or download from StudioStyl.es, then convert and import. Want a dark theme? Easy!
